response.overview: Marco, a 14 year old boy, is invited to the park by a friend. Once his friend arrives, he introduces him to a group of his friends who stand in a circle every day and tell each other horror stories. Days pass, meetings pass and he begins to discover disturbing things about the group of friends. He discovers that these meetings are actually an ancient pagan tradition and behind all this there is a Satanist sect.
response.tagline: Nel cuore del gruppo, Il terrore si risveglia
response.title: Il Cerchio
